headline: RBC Flags Service-Focused Valuation, Cuts Leidos Holdings, Inc. (LDOS) Target from $230 to $215
summary: Leidos Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:LDOS) is among the 20 Best Investments in 2026. The tenth position on our list is given to Leidos Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:LDOS). TheFly reported on February 18 that RBC Capital lowered its price target for LDOS to $215 from $230 and maintained an Outperform rating. The company’s fourth-quarter results were mixed, with […]
